upgrade.description: This release closes out most of the open bugs still and brings about more stability. There should be minimal risk to side effects

features.description: Implements actions of a dataGrid when when viewed on a mobile device with the default mobile template
Adds filtering for any list of editors: functions, templates, scripts, etc
Adds the ability to sort the API Routes to change priority of matching

upgrade.description: This release closes out most of the open bugs still and brings about more stability. There should be minimal risk to side effects

bugs.description: Fixes an issue with the page number list that causes too many pages to be listed
This is being cleared from the list after being confirmed fixed
This is similar to another issue that was closed - and this is being closed since it can not be replicated as described
Fixes Date field types not being able to be conditionally required
Fixes a signature field being added to a form in a microApp
Fixes Viewing previous versions and accessing the versioned structure
Fixes over aggressive change detection when leaving the page
Fixes API instance editing when no fields defined on options form

upgrade.description: Run 'composer update' to add 'doctrine/dbal' in order to alter the column size and 'php artisan migration' to change the app and workflow descriptions columns

features.description: Finalize support for 0 keys in the datamap of workflows
Finalize support public apis and document use. Also creates public user when a new environment is created and defaults a new users data to public when adding users.
Requires the slugs for microApp and workflow instances within a group to be unique to prevent collisions

Validate uniqueness in MicroApp editor for Resource, Script, Template and Form names

Validate uniqueness in Workflow editor for Template, Method, Resources and Map names

Validate uniqueness in Api's for Route path/verb combinations and for Resource, Function and File names
Before leaveing the editors for microApps, workflows, or api's you are given a warning if you have unsaved changes
Add PATCH as a verb to microApps in Graphene and to the APIGateway
Increased the description length for microApps and workflows to 1000 characters and added validation to the input forms
Added a configurable options form that can be created for an API and then configured in the API Instance

releases.notes: This release exchanges the master branch for the main branch. All branches are currently merged. All pull requests are merged as well. This is a new baseline and marks a change in the way releases will be managed, with frequency changing to a regular biweekly schedule.

features.description: Enable cache configuration of resouces in workflows

bugs.description: Merged pull request to fix unauthenticated navigation of public pages
Fixes a problem when searching a field in a GrapheneDataGrid whose type has a default template that is not defined explicitly on the field instance.
Allow Api's in the GrapheneApiGateway be configured to have no (0) required parameters and handle that scenario in the gateway itself and the generated documentation as well.
Fix 'user' type field configuration by not parsing the search field unless it is populated - this fixes a current problem introduced in the last release but a better pattern should be defined
